overview: In the early hours of March 5th 2006, defending his WBO super middleweight belt for a record 18th time and challenging for the IBF crown, Joe Calzaghe captured his second World title with a display that rocked the boxing world! Calzaghe's sublime 12 round destruction of US pre-fight favourite, Jeff 'Left Hook' Lacy, will be remembered as one of the greatest ring performances ever seen in Britain. Now, for the first time ever on video we present the definitive collection of Calzaghe's outstanding career-from his 1997 showdown with boxing legend Chris Eubank right through to the Lacy blockbuster. 'Super Champion Calzaghe' features over 2 hours of explosive action from 11 of Joe's best fights, including the match-ups with Omar Sheika, Richie Woodhall, Charles Brewer, Byron Mitchell and Kabary Salem.
title: Super Champion: Calzaghe
